title: Can't find Rune Pages
body: Sorry if this is the wrong place to put it but for the life of me I can not find the option to purchase rune pages. I go into store and into game play but I don't see the options to buy one. I've looked other places to but still can't find it.

replies.body: I can't find it either :/ Poking the store guys now.
This was the solution for me: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ciRILqPk-no-rune-page-purchase-option
I was looking in the help & support boards and someone had a problem there too. I don't think he was on Alpha Client so this may not be specific to alpha. Also my regular client is missing them too.
